summary: Failing test scores, drunk teachers, and an extortionist principal; it's up to Vice-Principal Tom to expose the principal's corruption and turn the school around before the school board shuts them down.
cast: Jason Biggs|Eva Longoria|Rob Corddry|Monica Potter|Will Sasso|Nat Faxon|Jill Latiano|Kyle Gass|Hayes MacArthur|Zachary Gordon|Ed Helms|Patricia Belcher|Jack Donner|Sandy Martin|Timothy Dowling|Erik Palladino|Matt Walsh|Miranda Bailey|Ryan Whitney|Christian Pikes|Darius Rose|Dannika Liddell|Alejandro Patiño|Logan Grove|Nathan Wesdell|Grant Klemann|Jarrod Bailey|Gigi Goff|Anthony Tavera|Kiernan Shipka|David Weiss|Andy Pessoa|Uriah Shelton|Nicholas Roget-King|Chris Kerner|Rob Weaver|Allen Alvarado|Juan Carlos Cantu|Ethynn Tanner Cerney|Michael Chey|Johnny Drocco|Brenda Goodbread|Geoffrey Gould|Maya Harvey|Maxine Hayden|James Howarth|Nadji Jeter|Patrick Manuel|Miranda May|Ethan Mekhi|Luca Oriel|Jonathan Rackman|Zach Selwyn|Kaliya Skye|Bryan James Taylor|Jim Cody Williams
title: Lower Learning
